name: I was rebuilt
description: I was rebuilt is a platform rage game were you play as R3B, a robot created by Dr. Zhang. You must help R3B to complete all the tests of a TV show to get the module of free will.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 100 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX9 Compatible GPU - 100MB graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 35 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 200 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU - 128MB graphics DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 50 MB available space
